channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Seeing Greene: Insurance and Taxes Killed My Cash Flow, Should I Sell?
item.description: Want a quicker way to buy rental properties? One that takes less cash, less time, and is beginner-friendly? Then you’re in the right place! In this Seeing Greene, we’re talking […]

item.title: TikTok acknowledges exploit targeting high-profile accounts
item.description: The malicious attack appears to have involved malware transmitted through TikTok's DMs. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: A Jury of Trump’s Peers Weighs In
item.description: We asked 12 people with criminal convictions what they think of the verdict in Trump’s hush money trial.

item.title: Federal Experts Talk Bird Flu ‘What Ifs’ in WebMD Live Event
item.description: WebMD brought together experts from four federal agencies to talk prevention, monitoring, and what the “what ifs” of bird flu might look like.

item.title: Coast FI at 24 and a $99K Net Worth Thanks to a Few Years of Pure Hustle
item.description: Could Coast FI be your BEST path to financial independence? Maybe you don’t want to retire early—not yet, at least. Hustle for a few years, invest your money, and watch […]

item.title: AI apocalypse? ChatGPT, Claude and Perplexity all went down at the same time
item.description: It's unusual for three major AI providers to all be down at the same time, which could signal a broader infrastructure issues or internet-scale problem. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: In St. Louis, a Racial Disparity in Whose Killings Get Solved
item.description: In the past decade, police solved fewer than half of the homicide cases with Black victims and two-thirds of the cases with White ones.

item.title: What’s Next in Health Care for Older Adults: Questions and Answers With John Whyte, MD
item.description: As WebMD’s chief medical officer, John Whyte, MD, is in a unique position to see both the current state of medical care for America’s older adults and the way things are trending for the future. We asked him to share his insight on a few topics, along with a bit of advice.

item.title: Malta is a Hot, Stunning Island Market in Europe—Here’s How to Invest There

item.title: A look at LoanSnap’s troubles and which neobanks are having a moment
item.description: Welcome to TechCrunch Fintech! This week, we’re looking at LoanSnap’s woes, Nubank’s and Monzo’s positive milestones, a plethora of fintech fundraises and more! To get a roundup of TechCrunch’s biggest and most important fintech stories delivered to your inbox every Tuesday at 7:00 a.m. PT, subscribe here. item.title: How We Reported on Homicide Investigations in St. Louis
item.description: Getting and interpreting homicide clearance data involved litigation, complex analysis and patience.

item.title: Get the Care You Need in a COVID-19 World
item.description: What to expect at the doctor’s office, hospitals, and long-term care facilities, the future of telemedicine, and how to get the best care during COVID-19.

item.title: Databricks acquires Tabular to build a common data lakehouse standard
item.description: Databricks, the analytics and AI giant, has acquired data management company Tabular for an undisclosed sum. (CNBC reports that Databricks payed over $1 billion.) According to Tabular co-founder Ryan Blue, he and Tabular’s other two co-founders, Daniel Weeks and Jason Reid, will be joining Databricks in some capacity. There, they’ll work to unify Tabular’s and […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Why 1,000 Homicides in St. Louis Remain Unsolved
item.description: In one of America’s deadliest cities, police have struggled to solve killings due to staffing shortages, shoddy detective work and lack of community trust.

item.title: Personal Shopper: A Savvy Black Entrepreneur Guides You to Eczema-Friendly Clothes, Creams, Cosmetics, and More
item.description: A savvy black entrepreneur guides you on an eczema-friendly shopping spree.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm. What started as a tool to hyper-charge productivity through writing essays and code with short text prompts has evolved into a behemoth used by more than 92% of Fortune 500 companies for more wide-ranging needs. And that growth has propelled OpenAI itself into becoming […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.description: We spoke with seven reproductive rights organizations — here’s what we found.

item.title: Behind the Spike in Colorectal Cancer Among Young Americans
item.description: Colorectal cancer cases increased a whopping 333% among 15- to 19-year-olds and 185% among 20- to 24-year-olds from 1999 to 2020.
